name: Ninja Leap (Nocturne Games)
description:
One sunny day in the dojo, the apprentice ninja warriors decided to hold a competition to see who could leap the highest… will it be you?

In this game you play any one of 15 unlockable ninjas and attempt to leap up the screen and get as high and as rich as possible, all the while avoiding monsters and traps and using springs to jump even higher. Collect coins along the way to unlock new characters and backgrounds.

FEATURES:

  • 15 characters!
  • 3 different worlds to unlock!
  • Monsters, traps, springs, disappearing platforms and more!
  • Google Play achievements and leaderboards!
  • Kawaii ninja graphics! :P
